mapper.sql: id, uptime, terminal_id, carno, lon, lat, speed, direction, height, mile, oil, `status`, alarmflag, acc, `position`, lon_gcj02, lat_gcj02, savetime
mapper.select: select * from ${tableName} where terminal_id= #{terminalId} and savetime <= STR_TO_DATE(#{eTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and savetime > STR_TO_DATE(#{sTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and speed>0 ORDER BY savetime ASC;
mapper.insert: insert into t_history_position (id, uptime, terminal_id, carno, lon, lat, speed, direction, height, mile, oil, `status`, alarmflag, acc, `position`, lon_gcj02, lat_gcj02, savetime) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{terminalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{speed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mile,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oil,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acc,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{position,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lonGcj02,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{latGcj02,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{savetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_history_position
terminal_id = #{terminalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carno = #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
speed = #{speed,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
direction = #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER},
height = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mile = #{mile,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
oil = #{oil,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarmflag = #{alarmflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
acc = #{acc,jdbcType=TINYINT},
`position` = #{position,jdbcType=TINYINT},
lon_gcj02 = #{lonGcj02,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lat_gcj02 = #{latGcj02,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
savetime = #{savetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and uptime = #{uptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update t_history_position set terminal_id = #{terminalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carno = #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, speed = #{speed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, direction = #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, height = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, mile = #{mile,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, oil = #{oil,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarmflag = #{alarmflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acc = #{acc,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `position` = #{position,jdbcType=TINYINT}, lon_gcj02 = #{lonGcj02,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lat_gcj02 = #{latGcj02,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, savetime = #{savetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and uptime = #{uptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
